channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 2nd July
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure required please cut back overgrown hedge an vegetation back brambles back to boundary approximately 100 metres x2 metres (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture dumped at entrance to Whaddon Park, 2nd July
item.description:
Furniture dumped inside Whaddon Park, close to entrance on Whaddon Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whaddon Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree with solid overhanging limbs which have cracked the windscreen on the top deck of a bus operating service 97 to Cheltenham at 12:06 on 02/07/2025, 2nd July
item.description:
The tree is located in Station Road, Churchdown about 50 metres south east of the bus stop shelter named Community Centre (bus stop id is glodjtmt). what3words location is spaces.cheetahs.merge. It is the first in a line of trees on the nearside of the road leading up to the railway bridge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signs and barriers left by contractors causing obstruction. Health and safety trip hazzard. This has been reported and closed twice, the obstruction is still there., 2nd July
item.description:
Walk up alley between 14 and 15 Brookway drive., GL538AJ. At the end of the alley, to the left.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Brookway Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
